content: original japanese name ベビーシューズ *bebī shūzu* english name baby shoes direct link to pattern pdf 1 https //web archive org/web/20101214062557if_/http //data cloverhobby jp 80/hand/pdf/no_67/no_67f pdf pattern is entirely in japanese but charted no gauge is listed in the pattern calls for japanese size 6/0 3 5 mm hook recommended yarn is clover honobono 2 note for those who are curious *honobono* means heartwarming in japanese i left the title in japanese since that s the name of the yarn 1 https //web archive org/web/20101214062557if_/http //data cloverhobby jp 80/hand/pdf/no_67/no_67f pdf 2 http //www clover co jp/kyan/knit/zakka/shouhin_l shtml
